Revenant.notes: Corpse called back by grievance. Slow to fall unless named and forgiven.

Vampire_Noble.notes: Courteous until hungry. Courts favor, drains cities.

Pylon_Shade.notes: Born when a Va-Pylon half-activates. Flickers, phases through walls near leylines.

Thorn_Stalker.notes: Grown from briars and bone. Hunts by the taste of fear-sweat.

Ironbound_Golem.notes: Runes gone feral. Soul-metal heart hammers like a forge.

Drowned_Matron.notes: Sings kindly, drowns cruelly. Salt breaks her hold.

Gearwomb_Hulk.notes: Vat-bred ogre variant with iron staples and chain-mail scars. Charges at loudest sound.

Sand_Djinn.notes: Formed of blowing grit and old names. Bound by circles of wet clay and true bargains.
